caption.p: Comparison of cyclic voltammograms of Mg 3Bi 2 composite electrode (red), Mg 3Sb 2 (blue) in 1.0 mol L −1 Mg(TFSA) 2 in acetonitrile and Mg deposition/dissolution in 0.5 mol L −1 Mg(TFSA) 2 in BuMeG3 (green). The sweep rates of the voltammetry are 0.1 mV s −1 for Mg 3Bi 2 and Mg 3Sb 2, and 1.0 mV s −1 for Mg deposition/dissolution.
